Reference

All functions

ALELICA()

Allelic interactions

aveia

Dataset: Oat data

blupis()

Number of individuals to be selected in each family

clima

Data: Climate Data Set for Predictions

coefend

Data: Data: Endogamy Coefficient Data Set

Coeficiente_endogamia()

Inbreeding coefficient

cvar()

Estimation of variance components by restricting the variability of the witnesses.

deltat()

Optimum conditions for pesticide application

desvamb

Data: Data set for calculating the environmental deviation

desv_clim()

Auxiliary function for calculating ISGR

estresse()

Stress indices for genotype selection

fototermal()

Photothermal Index

genot

Data: GxE Interaction

genpar()

General parameters for selection

gga()

Additive Genetic Gain

GS()

Selection pressure

GS2()

Single Selection Differential

GS3()

Response to Selection by Control of Genitors

GS4()

Response to Selection by Year

gvri()

Selection for Grain Volume

hello()

Hello, World!

heterose()

Heterosis and Heterobeltiosis

iaf()

Leaf Area Index (LAI)

index_vigor()

Complete vigor index

indger()

Índice de germinação pela contagem subsequente

indviab()

Ear Indexes

isgr()

ISGR - Genetic Selection Index for Resilience

is_ptnerg()

Selection index for protein and grain yield

is_qindustrial()

Industrial quality of wheat

itu()

Environmental Stress Index

ivig_simp()

Simple Vigor Index

Jinks_Pooni()

Jinks and Pooni method

lin

Data: Wheat Data Set with Protein and Grain Yield

linearest()

Estimates using polynomial equations.

maize

Data: Maize Dataset

mut_index()

Multivariate seed vigor index

ph()

Hectolitre weight of cereals

pheno

Soybean Plastochron Estimation Data Set

plastocrono()

Soybean plastochron estimation

ptn

Data: Wheat Dataset 1

ptnrg

Data: Wheat Dataset 2

reg_GP()

Regression Genitor Progeny

rend_ind()

Peeling Index and Industrial Yield

restr()

Restriction of witness variability

risco()

Risk of Disease Occurrence in Soybeans

SEGREGAÇÃO_PADRÃO()

Standard Segregation

somatermica()

Accumulated Thermal Sum

speedb()

Estimativa dos ganhos por Speed Breeding

tamef()

Effective Population Size

TEMP_BASE()

Plotting the optimum and cardinal temperatures for crops

tindex()

AIC e multitrait de sementes de aveia preta

transgressivos()

Seleção pelo Diferencial de Seleção (Média e Desvios)

trigo

Data: Wheat Dataset 3

vig

Data Set for Seed Vigor Extraction
